original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīya (2), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya

original: 11.10. Vedanāttika, Kusalattika
analyzed: vedanā attika kusala attika

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusala

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya

original: nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca na adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhamma

original: paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na adukkhamasukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ

original: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
analyzed: ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto na kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: hetu paccayāḥ na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: sampayuttam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca na adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca

original: naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayutto nakusalo ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo ca dhammā
analyzed: sampayuttaḥ na kusalo ca na adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalo ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā …pe… satta.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayutta

original: nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
analyzed: hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya

original: sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto nakusalo dhammo
analyzed: sampayuttam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca naadukkhamasukhāya
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalam ca na adukkham asukhāya

original: vedanāya sampayuttaṁ nakusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
analyzed: vedanāya sampayuttam na kusalañca dhammam paṭicca na adukkham asukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ

original: nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe satta

original: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa, ārammaṇe ekūnapaññāsa …pe… purejāte āsevane aṭṭhacattālīsa …pe… avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa ārammaṇe ekūnapaññāsa pe purejāte āsevane aṭṭhacattālīsa pe avigate ekūnapaññāsa

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa …pe… purejāte aṭṭhacattālīsa, āsevane sattacattālīsa …pe… avigate ekūnapaññāsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnapaññāsa pe purejāte aṭṭhacattālīsa āsevane sattacattālīsa pe avigate ekūnapaññāsa

original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttam na abyākatam dhammam paṭicca na sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā aṭṭhacattālīsa pe avigate aṭṭhacattālīsa sabbattha vitthāro
